name: Choose one
description:
M.M.I pt 4: Dissociative Identity Disorder (Multiple Personality Disorder)

"...sike! Even I, can't."

A disorder that is usually caused by either physical, emotional or sexual abuse. Dissociation is a "central theme" of DID, a disruption of how a person functions in everyday life.

Museum of Mental Incapabilities is a collection of artworks depicting mental health problems and disorders. Explore and understand what it feels like to live with various mental incapacities.
